name: Get Out!!
description:
A girl with superpowers is held in a maximum-security prison. While the power is out you have one chance to fight your way out.

Gamepad is recommended (Keyboard less tested)

Xbox controller:

  • A - Jump/Actions
  • X - Melee Attack
  • Y - Previous Item
  • B - Next Item
  • RB -  Control Physics/Shoot/Climb (Depending on what item is currently used)
  • Right Stick - Aim
  • Left Sick - Movement

PlayStation controller:

  • X - Jump/Actions
  • Square - Melee Attack
  • Triangle - Previous Item
  • Circle - Next Item
  • RB -  Control Physics/Shoot/Climb (Depending on what item is currently used)
  • Right Stick - Aim
  • Left Sick - Movement

Keyboard  (Change the controller from the main menu) :

  • Space -Jump/Actions
  • Mouse LB - Melee Attack/Shoot
  • Mouse RB -  Control Physics/Throw on release
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Q - Previous Item
  • E - Next Item
  • Shift - Climb 
  • WASD - Movement
